title: Mike Davis, Who Wrote of Los Angeles and Catastrophe, Dies at 76
description: In “City of Quartz” and other books, he predicted trouble ahead. Events often proved him right.
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
media:description: The urban theorist Mike Davis in the Angeles National Forest in 1999. Los Angeles, he wrote, “has come to play the double role of utopia and dystopia for advanced capitalism.”
